name: venugupta.github.io
body:
### Welcome to My Pages!!!
Myself Venu Bukka, software programmer hailing from down south of India. I work as a senior software engineer at a major US multinational.
For any software consulting, do reach me at my [email](mailto: venugupta4u@gmail.com)

###Some of my open-source projects:

### [Multi-Threaded Worker Queue](http://venugupta.github.io/multi-threaded-worker-queue/)
Based on real-world worker-task model where workers are assigned tasks periodically by a master worker process provided its previous tasks are complete

### [Worker Process](http://venugupta.github.io/worker-process/)
We all know IIS instantiates a worker process the first time it receives a request and worker process creates app domains, spawns a thread for each request to serve.
This project shows one possible implementation of the same in .NET

### [Web Form Validator](http://venugupta.github.io/web-form-validator/)
This Jqeury based web form validator makes form validation as simple as calling a function!!!!! 

### [Workflow Framework](http://venugupta.github.io/Workflow-Framework-private.Contact-me-for-source-code-/)
Framework to automate workflows
(Contact me for source code)

### [Cheap Air Engine](http://venugupta.github.io/Cheap-Air-Engine-hire-me-for-code-/)
Want to build a air search/book engine competing with the world leaders, hire me !!!! If you have the zeal to compete with the some of the leading travel fare portals, you'll get hotel/car engine for free!!!!!

### Authors and Contributors
Venu Bukka (@venugupta)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
